articles.title: Argentina Experienced Its Hottest Winter Day in Over 100 Years
articles.description: Global temperatures are rising everywhere, even in the southern hemisphere where it’s supposed to be winter.
articles.content:
Buenos Aires in Argentina saw an especially hot start to this August, and temperatures spiked above 30 degrees Celsius throughout the capital for the first time in years.
“It is the warmest beginning of August in 117 years of data. The previous one w... [1789 chars]

articles.title: South America sweats under high temps -- in the middle of winter

articles.title: Argentina depart with zero win in Women's World Cup: ‘They gave their all,’ says coach
articles.description: Argentinian women's football team showed promise despite exiting Women's World Cup without a win.
articles.content: The Argentinian women's football team departed the Women's World Cup in New Zealand with a sense of both disappointment and optimism. While they fell short of securing any win, the team's spirited performances in their three matches have given them h... [1659 chars]

articles.title: Analysis: China holds the key to avoiding Argentina's IMF default. The price tag is unknown
articles.description: A helping hand from China saw Argentina avert a default with the International Monetary Fund for the second time in 30 days, as the cash-strapped country tapped almost $3 billion of a Beijing currency swap line to pay the multilateral lender.
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 2 (Reuters) - A helping hand from China saw Argentina avert a default with the International Monetary Fund for the second time in 30 days, as the cash-strapped country tapped almost $3 billion of a Beijing currency swap line to pay the mu... [5063 chars]

articles.description: Rebecka Blomqvist broke the deadlock with a headed goal at the 66th-minute mark to help Sweden finish 3-0 and win Group G

articles.title: Sweden relishing World Cup showdown with holders U.S.
articles.description: Sweden will be refreshed and ready for Sunday's tantalising tie against holders United States in the Women's World Cup last 16, coach Peter Gerhardsson said after his second-string side reached the knockouts with a clinical win over Argentina.

articles.title: Sweden brush Argentina aside to tee up last-16 meeting with USA
articles.description: Rebecka Blomqvist and Elin Rubensson were on target in a 32-0 win over Argentina that put Sweden to the last 16 with a perfect record
articles.content: A much-changed Sweden side reached the Women’s World Cup last 16 with a perfect record after Rebecka Blomqvist’s second-half header and substitute Elin Rubensson’s 90th-minute penalty helped them beat Argentina. Blomqvist met Sofia Jakobsson’s cross ... [2453 chars]
